casebody.head_matter:
Mellon National Bank & Trust Co. v. Pittsburgh & Lake Erie Railroad Company, Appellant.
Argued September 30, 1965.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Herbert Grigsby, with him Gordon E. Neuenschwander, and Pringle, Bredin, Thomson, Rhodes & Grigsby, for appellants.

November 9, 1965:
